title: Mixed Methods-Based Strategy Development for Online Higher Education Teaching and Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Seeks optimized approaches for online teaching methodologies and assessment in language education for pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: Explain the procedure for analyzing online teaching methods and assessment approaches using the Delphi technique and surveys.
Design online language education strategies considering learner preferences and effectiveness.
Propose improvements for online classes focused on summative evaluation based on mixed research results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
